ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: EC50; Species: Daphnia magna (Water flea, 2-24 hours old); Conditions: static bioassay, 16 hr light 8 hr dark cycle (light intensity of 200 lx), oxygen concentration of 8.4-8.6, temperature 20.2-20.5 °C, pH 7.75-8.19; Concentration: 11.5 mg/L for 48 hours; Effect: immobilization. (65-75% cinnamaldehyde).

LC50; Species: Daphnia magna (Water fleas, less than 24 hours old); Conditions: semi-static bioassay, 16 hours light and 8 hours dark cycle, conductivity 590-600 umhos/cm, pH 6.8-7.1, dissolved oxygen 8.2-9.1 mg/L, temperature 19.5-20.7 °C; Concentrations: 4.22 mg/L for 48 hours (100% cinnamaldehyde).

EC50; Species: Selenastrun capricornutum (Green algae); Conditions: pH 7.5, 24 hours light (intensity 400-410 foot candle), temperature 23.2-24 °C; Concentration: 4.07-6.87 for 72 hours; Effect: growth inhibition, and decreased reproduction (100% Cinnamaldehyde)
